snippet: The American League East race between the Orioles and the Yankees was closer in September than any such race since 1889.
abstract: American League East race between Baltimore Orioles and New York Yankees was closer in September than any such race since 1889.
lead_paragraph: The American League East race between the Orioles and the Yankees was closer in September than any such race since 1889.

headline.seo: Orioles’ Close Marathon With Yankees Becomes a Sprint
headline.main: Close 2-Team Marathon Now Turns Into a Sprint
headline.print_headline: Close 2-Team Marathon Now Turns Into a Sprint
